content: awareness ribbon 8 or 12 square original pattern by carolyn vanostran i made this pattern when i was looking for a square to make for a comfortghan and couldn t find what i was looking for you may use this pattern as much as you like but please don t sell the pattern skill level intermediate hook size h/8 5 0mm gauge -- 7 double_crochet and 4 row = 2 x 2 yarn size 4 worsted weight like rh supersaver stitches used double_crochet yo insert hook into stitch indicated and pull up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook yo and draw through 2 loops again fpdc yo insert hook from front to back to front again around post of st indicated yo draw through 2 loops on hook yo and draw through 2 loops again fptr yo 2 times insert hook from front to back to front again around post of st indicated yo draw through 2 loops on hook yo and draw through 2 loops on hook yo and draw through 2 loops again notes occasionally stitches get lost under corner stitches and the fpdc and fptr you will need to push those stitches aside in order to get to that stitch **rounds 7 & 11 ea have an extra double_crochet on one side of the corner this is not a typo pattern chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form a ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet chain 2 three more times in center of ring join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 12dc 4 chain-2 sps round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space *double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space repeat from * 3 times join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 28 double_crochet 4 chain-2 sps round 3 chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet fpdc around next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet *fpdc around next double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet fpdc around next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * 3 times fpdc around next double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 36 double_crochet 8 fpdc 4 chain-2 sps round 4 skip next 2 double_crochet fptr around next fpdc working behind fptr just made double_crochet in joining st and next 2 double_crochet working over fptr fptr around fpdc on this same side of square this makes the cross over part of the ribbon double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet * 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next fpdc and next 3 double_crochet fptr around next fpdc working behind fptr just made double_crochet in 3 double_crochet just skipped working over fptr fptr around fpdc just skipped double_crochet in last
